enumtype.description: The premium state of the shop

relation.description: The one to many relation between a shop and offers

targetElement.description: An offer sold by a shop

relation.description: The many to many relation between the export catalog job and the languages

targetElement.description: Additional language to be used by the catalog export

relation.description: The many to many relation between a core attribute and the composed types on which it is set

sourceElement.description: The Mirakl Core Attribute defining its variant type owners

targetElement.description: The composed type owner of the attribute (the type on which the attribute should be set)

relation.description: The many to many relation between a catalog and the languages in which its product attributes values should be translated.

targetElement.description: The languages in which product attribute values are translatable

relation.description: The many to many relation between a core attribute configuration and its core attributes.

targetElement.description: The core attributes linked to the configuration

relation.description: The many to many relation between the custom fields import cron job and the entity to which is assigned the custom field to import

sourceElement.description: The custom fields import cron job

targetElement.description: Type of the custom field related entity to import
